page.title: 13Recreation in Itchenor area
page.content: Many recreational pursuits are avail- able at Itchenor; water sports from sailing, surfing,sailboarding and swimming to fishing, either from fishing boats or beach casting. {Walks:}the Sussex Border Path goes round the coast of Thorney; the public footpath which runs along the coast from Itchenor to East Head; and many short, linking footpaths. {Birdwatching}is popular at East Head and on Thorney and Pilsea Islands. All three places are perfect habitats for birds as there is abundant food and little pollution or disturbance, Pilsea having recently been acquired by the R.Soc.Protection of Birds. Yachtsmen visiting Pilsea may walk all round the island by way of the beach and across the grassland on the western side, a distance of about 1 mile.
